/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a bridge overlooking the street, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a hazy blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street below. A white car can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
